text.text_translated: Potentially Hazardous Asteroids are rocks that come near Earth’s orbit. They pass closer than 7.5 million kilometres to Earth’s path around the Sun. NASA is a space group from the USA. NASA has made a map with 1,400 of these asteroids. NASA does not think any of these rocks will hit Earth in the next 100 years. NASA uses technology to watch these asteroids. It can see where they go and say if they might hit us. If needed, NASA can send two ways to stop the rocks from hitting Earth.

best_attempt.text_translated:
An asteroid is a big rock in space. NASA is a space agency from the USA. An orbit is the path that planets or rocks follow around the Sun or Earth. An impact is when something hits another thing hard. Defence means ways to stop danger.

Some asteroids are near Earth's orbit. They come closer than 7.5 million kilometres. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids. NASA does not think any will hit Earth in the next 100 years.

NASA uses technology to watch these asteroids. They can see where the asteroids are going. NASA can say if an asteroid might hit Earth. If needed, NASA can use two ways to stop the asteroid from hitting us.
